subject: RE: [junit] One test class per class (was Testing multiple interfaces?)
msgSnippet: ... That s another reason why test groups are so important.  This way, you can say run all the database tests and you don t care in what classes or packages
messageBody:
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of Robert Watkins

> One test per class makes it easy to find tests that may be
> affected by a feature change. This makes it easy to run
> localised tests.

That's another reason why test groups are so important. This way, you can
say "run all the database tests" and you don't care in what classes or
packages they are.

--
